hero.subtitle: Provide a complete gamification experience for websites and applications, including various game types like turntable, egg smashing, scratch cards, etc. Supports multi-tenant architecture, providing complete API integration and a management backend.

features.title: Platform Core Features
features.subtitle: A gamification solution designed for modern websites and applications, providing complete game management and user engagement functions.

card1.title: Diverse Games
card1.text: Supports various game types such as turntable, egg smashing, and scratch cards to meet different scenario needs, enhancing user participation and retention.

card2.title: Multi-Tenant Architecture
card2.text: Supports independent operation of multiple websites, with each tenant having independent game configurations, user management, and data analysis functions.

card3.title: API Integration
card3.text: Provides a complete RESTful API interface with HMAC signature verification to ensure secure data transmission and easy integration into existing systems.

card4.title: Data Analytics
card4.text: Real-time game data and user behavior analysis, providing detailed statistical reports to help optimize game strategies and user experience.

card5.title: Secure and Reliable
card5.text: HMAC signature verification mechanism prevents data tampering and malicious attacks, ensuring game fairness and data integrity.

card6.title: High Performance
card6.text: Optimized game engine supports high concurrent access, with 99.9% system availability, ensuring smooth game operation.

cta.title: Start Your Gamification Journey
cta.subtitle: Experience our SaaS gaming platform now and bring a new level of user engagement to your website.
